@page "/TreeGrid/RowHeight"

@using Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.TreeGrid
@using Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids
@using ej2_blazor_samples
@using ej2_blazor_wrapdata
@inherits SampleBaseComponent;

@{
    List<object> tools = new List<object>();
    tools.Add(new { prefixIcon = "e-big-icon", id = "small", align = "Left", tooltipText = "Small" });
    tools.Add(new { prefixIcon = "e-medium-icon", id = "medium", align = "Left", tooltipText = "Medium" });
    tools.Add(new { prefixIcon = "e-small-icon", id = "big", align = "Left", tooltipText = "Big" });
}

<div class="col-lg-12 control-section">
    <div class="content-wrapper">
        <div class="row">
            <EjsTreeGrid DataSource="@TreeGridData" @ref="TreeGrid" IdMapping="TaskId" ParentIdMapping="ParentId" TreeColumnIndex="1"  RowHeight=RowsHeight Toolbar="tools" Height="350">
                <TreeGridEvents TValue="string" OnToolbarClick="ToolBarClick"></TreeGridEvents>
                <TreeGridColumns>
                    <TreeGridColumn Field="TaskId" HeaderText="Task ID" Width="83" TextAlign="TextAlign.Right"></TreeGridColumn>
                    <TreeGridColumn Field="TaskName" HeaderText="Task Name" Width="240"></TreeGridColumn>
                    <TreeGridColumn Field="StartDate" HeaderText=" Start Date" Format="d" Type=ColumnType.Date Width="106" TextAlign="TextAlign.Right"></TreeGridColumn>
                    <TreeGridColumn Field="EndDate" HeaderText=" End Date" Format="d" Type=ColumnType.Date Width="106" TextAlign="TextAlign.Right"></TreeGridColumn>
                    <TreeGridColumn Field="Duration" HeaderText="Duration" Width="90" TextAlign="TextAlign.Right"></TreeGridColumn>
                    <TreeGridColumn Field="Progress" HeaderText="Progress" Width="91" TextAlign="TextAlign.Right"></TreeGridColumn>
                    <TreeGridColumn Field="Priority" HeaderText="Priority" Width="94"></TreeGridColumn>
                </TreeGridColumns>
            </EjsTreeGrid>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<style>

    @@font-face {
        font-family: 'e-grid-rowheight';
        src: url(data:application/x-font-ttf;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('truetype');
        font-weight: normal;
        font-style: normal;
    }

    .e-grid .e-small-icon::before {
        font-family: 'e-grid-rowheight';
        content: '\e707';
    }

    .e-grid .e-medium-icon::before {
        font-family: 'e-grid-rowheight';
        content: '\e701';
    }

    .e-grid .e-big-icon::before {
        font-family: 'e-grid-rowheight';
        content: '\e702';
    }
</style>

@code{
    EjsTreeGrid<WrapData> TreeGrid;

    public List<WrapData> TreeGridData { get; set; }

    public double RowsHeight { get; set; } = 20;
    
    protected override void OnInitialized()
    {
        this.TreeGridData = WrapData.GetWrapData().ToList();
    }
   
    public void ToolBarClick(Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Navigations.ClickEventArgs args)
    {
        if (args.Item.Id == "small")
        {
            RowsHeight = 20;
        }
        if (args.Item.Id == "medium")
        {
            RowsHeight = 40;
        }
        if (args.Item.Id == "big")
        {
            RowsHeight = 60;
        }
    }
}
